mapper.sql: SELECT authorize_transaction_rental.id, authorize_transaction_rental.client_key, authorize_transaction_rental.category, authorize_transaction_rental.sales_id, authorize_transaction_rental.card_number, authorize_transaction_rental.expiration_date, authorize_transaction_rental.security_key, authorize_transaction_rental.tx_fee, authorize_transaction_rental.transaction_id, authorize_transaction_rental.status, authorize_transaction_rental.auth_code, authorize_transaction_rental.type, authorize_transaction_rental.amount, authorize_transaction_rental.price, authorize_transaction_rental.deposit, authorize_transaction_rental.ld_commission, authorize_transaction_rental.lde_commission, authorize_transaction_rental.dealer_commission, authorize_transaction_rental.sales_commission, authorize_transaction_rental.svc_charge, authorize_transaction_rental.activate_pay, authorize_transaction_rental.ld_activation_comm, authorize_transaction_rental.lde_activation_comm, authorize_transaction_rental.dealer_activation_comm, authorize_transaction_rental.sales_activation_comm, authorize_transaction_rental.create_time, auth_sales.username sales_name FROM authorize_transaction_rental JOIN auth_sales ON authorize_transaction_rental.sales_id = auth_sales.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO authorize_transaction_rental (sales_id, dealer_id, category, client_key, card_number,expiration_date, security_key, amount, price, deposit, ld_commission, lde_commission, dealer_commission, sales_commission, tx_fee, transaction_id, status, auth_code, type, svc_charge, activate_pay, ld_activation_comm, lde_activation_comm, dealer_activation_comm, sales_activation_comm) VALUES (#{salesId}, #{dealerId}, #{category}, #{clientKey}, #{cardNumber}, #{expirationDate}, #{securityKey}, #{amount}, #{price}, #{deposit}, #{ldCommission}, #{ldeCommission}, #{dealerCommission}, #{salesCommission}, #{txFee}, #{transactionId}, #{status}, #{authCode}, #{type}, #{svcCharge}, #{activatePay}, #{ldActivationComm}, #{ldeActivationComm}, #{dealerActivationComm}, #{salesActivationComm})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM authorize_transaction_rental WHERE client_key=#{clientKey} AND create_time LIKE concat(#{createTime},'%')
AND authorize_transaction_rental.sales_id=#{_parameter}
SELECT COALESCE (SUM(dealer_commission + dealer_activation_comm), 0) FROM authorize_transaction_rental WHERE dealer_id = #{dealerId}
SELECT COALESCE (SUM(sales_commission + sales_activation_comm), 0) FROM authorize_transaction_rental WHERE sales_id = #{salesId}

SELECT sales_id, sum(amount) amount, auth_sales.username salesName FROM authorize_transaction_rental, auth_sales WHERE authorize_transaction_rental.sales_id = auth_sales.id GROUP BY sales_id ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT #{_parameter};

SELECT sales_id, sum(amount) amount, auth_sales.username salesName FROM authorize_transaction_rental, auth_sales WHERE authorize_transaction_rental.sales_id = auth_sales.id AND authorize_transaction_rental.dealer_id=#{id} GROUP BY sales_id ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT #{leaderId};

SELECT sum(sales_commission + sales_activation_comm) commission, auth_sales.username salesUsername, COUNT(*) volume FROM authorize_transaction_rental JOIN auth_sales ON authorize_transaction_rental.sales_id=auth_sales.id WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY salesUsername ORDER BY volume;

SELECT sum(sales_commission) commission, auth_sales.username salesUsername, COUNT(*) volume FROM authorize_transaction_rental JOIN auth_sales ON authorize_transaction_rental.sales_id=auth_sales.id WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY salesUsername ORDER BY volume;

SELECT sum(sales_activation_comm) commission, auth_sales.username salesUsername, COUNT(*) volume FROM authorize_transaction_rental JOIN auth_sales ON authorize_transaction_rental.sales_id=auth_sales.id WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY salesUsername ORDER BY volume;

SELECT sum(dealer_commission) commission, auth_dealer.username dealerUsername, COUNT(*) volume FROM authorize_transaction_rental JOIN auth_dealer ON authorize_transaction_rental.dealer_id = auth_dealer.id WHERE authorize_transaction_rental.create_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY dealerUsername ORDER BY volume;

SELECT sum(dealer_commission + dealer_activation_comm) commission, auth_dealer.username dealerUsername, COUNT(*) volume FROM authorize_transaction_rental JOIN auth_dealer ON authorize_transaction_rental.dealer_id = auth_dealer.id WHERE authorize_transaction_rental.create_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY dealerUsername ORDER BY volume;

SELECT sum(dealer_activation_comm) commission, auth_dealer.username dealerUsername, COUNT(*) volume FROM authorize_transaction_rental JOIN auth_dealer ON authorize_transaction_rental.dealer_id = auth_dealer.id WHERE authorize_transaction_rental.create_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY dealerUsername ORDER BY volume;

SELECT sum(amount) amount, sum(price), sum(tx_fee) txFee, sum(deposit) deposit, sum(ld_commission) ldCommission, sum(lde_commission) ldeCommission, sum(dealer_commission) dealerCommission, sum(sales_commission) salesCommission, sum(svc_charge) svcCharge, sum(activate_pay) activatePay, sum(ld_activation_comm) ldActivationComm, sum(lde_activation_comm) ldeActivationComm, sum(dealer_activation_comm) dealerActivationComm, sum(sales_activation_comm) salesActivationComm, MONTH(create_time) date FROM authorize_transaction_rental WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY date;

SELECT sum(amount) amount, sum(price), sum(tx_fee) txFee, sum(deposit) deposit, sum(ld_commission) ldCommission, sum(lde_commission) ldeCommission, sum(dealer_commission) dealerCommission, sum(sales_commission) salesCommission, sum(svc_charge) svcCharge, sum(activate_pay) activatePay, sum(ld_activation_comm) ldActivationComm, sum(lde_activation_comm) ldeActivationComm, sum(dealer_activation_comm) dealerActivationComm, sum(sales_activation_comm) salesActivationComm, DAYOFMONTH(create_time) date FROM authorize_transaction_rental WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY date;
